spell.name: These Rocks Looks Great
entries: This spell wards a willing dwarf you touch and creates a mystic connection between you and the target until the spell ends. While the target is within 30 feet of you, you and the target gain a +2 bonus to AC and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. You and the target also gain {@dice 2d6} temporary hit points each (roll once for both), which are lost when the spell ends.

The spell ends if you drop to 0 hit points or if you and the target become separated by more than 30 feet. It also ends if the spell is cast again on either of the connected creatures. You can also dismiss the spell as an action.

components.m: a pebble and a dwarven beard hair

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional dwarf for each slot level above 2nd.
